questions.question: This Finnish programmer who started the Git project said "Software is like sex; it's better when it's free." Also "NVIDIA, fuck you!".
After creating the Web, he said "it doesn't just connect machines, it connects people."
This Oracle board chair, CTO and former CEO said "We don't have to fight open source, we have to exploit open source."

He said this in reference to a priority deque memo to another prof while working on the Art Of Computer Programming, not TeX or MetaFont, "Beware of bugs in the above code; I have only proved it correct, not tried it."
This Canadian OpenBSD programmer said "I don't need dancing baloney - I need stuff that works."
